sentences.en: Four months to the day, Ralph finally stood unaided.
sentences.cn: 到今天就四个月了, 拉尔夫终于独立地站立起来.

sentences.en: Gross crystalline imperfections like twinning are apparent to the unaided eye.
sentences.cn: 粗的晶体不完整性,如孪生体可用肉眼看出.

sentences.en: He captured a lion unaided by anyone.
He made his way down the aircraft steps unaided but moved shakily as he did so.
sentences.cn: 他独自一人走下了飞机梯级，双腿颤巍巍的。

sentences.en: Inclusions in I 1 diamonds often are seen to the unaided eye.
sentences.cn: I1等级的钻石常含有肉眼可见的内含物.

sentences.en: Made an unaided attempt to climb the sheer cliff.
sentences.cn: 我们终于登上了险峻的峭壁.

sentences.en: Most cells are too small to be detected by the unaided human eyes.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数细胞都很小,肉眼看不到.

sentences.en: She brought us up completely unaided.
sentences.cn: 完全是她一手把我们拉扯大的。

sentences.en: She can no longer walk unaided.
sentences.cn: 她再也不能独力行走了。

sentences.en: She professed that she could do nothing unaided.
sentences.cn: 她承认自己不能独立无助地做任何事.

sentences.en: She would pray for him, sitting up in bed unaided, her head lifted, her voice steady.
sentences.cn: 她就会不用搀扶,自个从床上坐起来, 抬着头, 用镇定不变的声音为他祈祷.

sentences.en: That comet is invisible to the unaided eye.
sentences.cn: 那颗彗星只用肉眼是看不到的.

sentences.en: There have been at least thirteen previous attempts to reach the North Pole unaided.
sentences.cn: 之前至少已经有过13次想独立到达北极的尝试。

sentences.en: This fungus can just be detected by the unaided eye.
sentences.cn: 这种真菌只用肉眼就能检查出.
